thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 78 of 625
thread.title: Darlene Floriano

author: Darlene Floriano
title: Darlene Floriano
text:
I am a larger woman who is active and exercises regularly. The way that these workout clothes makes me feel is extraordinary!
They fit nicely and the fabric feels great! I like that they have high waist pants. Being large the low waist do not compliment my shape and can bring my confidence down to work out in the gym.
Style is great but if you cannot feel good wearing the clothes then what is the point right?
Thank you for making sure you can expand your market to different sized customers.
